channel.title: How to make an item un tradeable and un droppable?
channel.description: hey guys i was wondering on how to make an items untradeable and un droppable... i would also like to have one more thing.. make it where admins cannot trade. AT ALL and also when they drop items they vanish. thanks i hope someone helps me :)
